wisps.registry package¶

Subpackages¶

  • wisps.registry.db package
    • Submodules
    • wisps.registry.db.db module

Submodules¶

wisps.registry.constants module¶

Module to give symbolic representation to magic strings and numbers.

wisps.registry.util module¶

class wisps.registry.util.nc_struct¶
wisps.registry.util.read_cache()¶

checks whether the function’s data has been chached or not. If it has, returns the values. otherwise, returns None.

wisps.registry.util.read_dimensions()¶

Reads and returns dimension definitions.

wisps.registry.util.read_gfs_tdlpack_lookup()¶

Reads and returns mosPlainLanguage > NetCDF variables yaml file.

wisps.registry.util.read_globals()¶

Reads and returns global attributes definitions.

wisps.registry.util.read_grib2_control()¶

Reads the grib2 control file that provides directory locations for the observations.

wisps.registry.util.read_grib2_lookup()¶

Reads and returns the grib2 -> NetCDF variables yaml file.

wisps.registry.util.read_marine_control()¶

Reads the marine control file that provides time ranges and directory locations for the observations.

wisps.registry.util.read_marine_lookup()¶

Returns the lookup table for METAR -> NetCDF variables.

wisps.registry.util.read_metar_control()¶

Reads the metar control file that provides time ranges and directory locations for the observations.

wisps.registry.util.read_metar_lookup()¶

Returns the lookup table for NetCDF -> METAR variables.

wisps.registry.util.read_metar_nc_lookup()¶

Returns the lookup table for METAR -> NetCDF variables.

wisps.registry.util.read_mosID_lookup()¶

Reads and returns the MOS ID -> NetCDF variables yaml file.

wisps.registry.util.read_mospred_control()¶

Reads the metar control file that provides time ranges and directory locations for the observations.

wisps.registry.util.read_nc_config()¶

Read YAML config files to get netcdf structure and properties.

wisps.registry.util.read_nc_meta()¶

Reads netcdf.yml file that contains the metadata for common variables.

wisps.registry.util.read_observedProperties()¶

Returns the set of all observedProperties.

wisps.registry.util.read_procedures()¶

Reads netcdf.yml file that contains the metadata for common variables.

wisps.registry.util.read_variables()¶

returns structured configuration of all WISPS supported variables.

wisps.registry.util.read_yaml(filename)¶

Reads the contents of a yaml file and returns the value.

wisps.registry.util.write_cache(data)¶

Caches data associated with calling function’s name to prevent re-reading a file.
